::: {#exr-what-kinda-thing-1}
What kind of mathematical object will the solution $\bf x$ to this matrix equation be?

$$\left(\begin{array}{r} 
4 & 7 & -4 & -1 & 1 \\ 
9 & -1 & 5 & 7 & -3 \\ 
\end{array}\right) \ {\bf x} \ =
\left(\begin{array}{r} 
6 \\ 
9 \\ 
\end{array}\right)$$

```{mcq}
#| label: what-kinda-think-1
#| inline: true
1. a scalar
2. a row vector with 2 elements
3. a row vector with 5 elements
4. a column vector with 2 elements
5. a column vector with 5 elements [correct]
```
:::
